meanings.sent1: The elephant was very grande compared to the tiny mouse.
meanings.sent2: The mountain was grande and majestic against the blue sky.
meanings.sent3: The grande cake towered over the other desserts on the table.
meanings.sent4: Her grande dreams reached for the stars and beyond.
meanings.sent5: The grande ship sailed across the vast ocean.

meanings.definition: A size of coffee at Starbucks, typically 16 ounces.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a grande coffee to start my day.
meanings.sent2: She always gets a grande latte on her way to work.
meanings.sent3: The grande cup of coffee kept her awake during the long meeting.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the grande coffee filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: He sipped the grande espresso slowly, savoring every drop.

meanings.definition: A person of great importance or influence.
meanings.sent1: The CEO was a grande in the business world.
meanings.sent2: She became a grande in the fashion industry through hard work.
meanings.sent3: The grande of the town was always invited to special events.
meanings.sent4: He was considered a grande in the field of medicine.
meanings.sent5: The grande of the community was respected by all.
